price: 难道他们没有研究《古兰经》吗？假如它不是安拉所启示的，他们必定发现其中有许多差别。
arabic: أَفَلَا يَتَدَبَّرُونَ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَۚ وَلَوۡ كَانَ مِنۡ عِندِ غَيۡرِ ٱللَّهِ لَوَجَدُواْ فِيهِ ٱخۡتِلَٰفٗا كَثِيرٗا

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: afalā yatadabbarūna al-qur'āna walaw kāna min ʿindi ghayri al-lahi lawajadū fīhi ikh'tilāfan kathīran
